field.name: description
field.value: I'm trying to create a custom validator. I need access to the validatorRunner, so I can't implement Build() vs. Build(IValidatorRunner, Type). ActiveRecordModelBuilder.ProcessProperties() requires a parameterless Build(). I'm stuck. Any ideas? I'd submit a patch, but I'm not familiar enough with ActiveRecordModelBuilder to contribute something sensible.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: ActiveRecord is not actively maintained, closing this issue as won't fix because of its age. Feel free to relog a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/castleproject/ActiveRecord/issues
